Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2009 08:07PM Stacy315 wrote: Hi There, I am a b-4 and scheduled for a surgical biopsy on 7/22.  I have been just as freaked out as you have been and all over the internet.  The fact is WE DON'T KNOW.  Try and take a deep breath and focus on what you can control.  Please let us know how things work out. Stacy (1959)
